text: fabdhuluu- 'ayuha almuminuna- fi taqwaa allah jahdakum wataqatukum, wasmaeuu larasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam simae tdbbur watafakura, wa'atieuu 'awamirah wajtanibuu nawahiha, wa'anfaquu mimaa razaqakum allah yakun khyrana lakum. wamin salim min albakhl wmane alfadl min almali, fa'uwliik hum alzaafirun bikuli khayrin, alfayizun bikulin mutlaba
